long_description: With clean lines, a dash of outdoor style, and compact size, the REI Tranquility Shoulder Bag is great for around town. It holds small essentials, with extra room for a book, ebook or light jacket. Protective neoprene sleeve holds iPad(R) and most ebooks. Straight 2-way zipper provides quick and easy top access. Also provides quick access to the organizer panel pocket, which includes pen slots, zip mesh pocket and phone slot. Side pockets stretch to increase capacity; conveniently stores a water bottle or allows quick access to small items. Exterior zip pocket securely stows small items. Adjustable-length shoulder strap with sliding shoulder pad provides comfort and secure shoulder carrying. REI Tranquility Shoulder Bag has an interior clip to keep keys secure.
short_description: With clean lines, a dash of outdoor style, and compact size, the REI Tranquility Shoulder Bag is great for around town. It holds small essentials, with extra room for a book, ebook or light jacket.
